original_title: Spandau Ballet: The Reformation Tour 2009 - Live at the O2
overview: In 2009 Spandau Ballet's first tour together for almost 20 years saw the triumphant return of one of the UK's most successful and best loved bands. Filmed during their sell out concerts at London's O2 Arena, Tony, John, Gary, Martin and Steve return with a vengeance in THE REFORMATION TOUR that brought 100,000 fans to their feet.
title: Spandau Ballet: The Reformation Tour 2009 - Live at the O2
